name: Oko Furia
description:
This game was made in 72 for the Ludum Dare 33 using the theme "You are the monster".

/!\ If you're not playing the postjam version make sure to lower your volume before playing as this game might literally blow your mind ;) (loud audio)

Description

Destroy buildings, eat helicopters and spread terror in the whole city. Dive to destroy as much buildings as you can while making the greatest combos possible, but don't get shot by an helicopter or it's game over.

Make sure to tweet your highscore with #OkoFuria !

Controls

X to flap

C to dive

Postjam

The postjam only features a more or less lower audio and a resizable window.
Nothing else has been changed or added apart from these two things.

Credits

Graphics, Programming and Design by Tselmek (@tselmek)

Audio and Design by Mike Daw (@mikedaw2000)
